backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components and hooks for the birthday flow app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts, mounting root div, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating the 6-step birthday flow, global UI toggles, overlays, and step rendering.
frontend/src/components/birthday/Birthda: Layout wrapper providing background visuals, looping audio handling, and footer, wrapping main birthday content.
frontend/src/components/birthday/Celebra: Generates a one-time celebratory particle burst using animated colored dots.
frontend/src/components/birthday/collect: Hidden collectible button that awards a collectible on click with animation and sound.
frontend/src/components/birthday/minigam: Displays temporary floating quote bubbles at given coordinates, adding and auto-removing them with optional reduced-motion animation.
Stores a list of inspirational quotes and provides a function to return a non-repeating random quote.
frontend/src/components/birthday/modals/: Shows an animated birthday note modal with a writable message, achievements display, and a download option.
Implements a balloon-popping minigame with sound, achievements, and floating quotes that appear when balloons are popped.
frontend/src/components/birthday/notific: Provides a top‑center toast notification layer using the Sonner Toaster.
frontend/src/components/birthday/Progres: Displays current progress across the 6-step flow with completed and active step indicators.
frontend/src/components/birthday/Sparkle: Pointer-tracking sparkle effect that spawns and fades sparkles when enabled unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/components/birthday/steps/S: Automatically opens the birthday note modal and allows reopening it after the first view.
Handles revealing a bouquet image, awarding an achievement, and advancing the step once revealed.
Displays an interactive candle-blowing activity based on age, awarding an achievement once all candles are extinguished.
Renders a gift box step that triggers a smiley burst, plays sound, and awards an achievement when opened.
Displays a mini‑game modal requiring balloon popping to proceed and tracks win state.
Handles age input, validation, and a celebratory transition before advancing the birthday flow.
frontend/src/components/birthday/steps/W: Provides decorative background elements and animated stickers for wish-related screens.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Error boundary component that catches runtime errors and displays a recovery UI with refresh/reset options.
frontend/src/features/achievements/achie: Defines achievement metadata and a helper to fetch an achievement by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBirthdayFlow.ts: Zustand store managing birthday flow state, steps, achievements, collectibles, audio, and progression logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and returns the user's prefers‑reduced‑motion setting.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.ts: React hook that caches and plays short sound effects with mute/armed checks and overlapping playback support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining light/dark OKLCH color variables, fonts, and custom celebratory styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentSlug.ts: Utilities to validate, sanitize, and produce safe deployment slugs with fallback behavior.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentSlugFromEnv: Reads deployment slug from env or document.title, sanitizes it, logs modifications, and provides a safe slug.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, fonts, shadows, and animations using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the birthday experience, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features.
